meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of aluminum oxide hydroxide, typically occurring in white or grayish-white tabular crystals.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found some boehmites during the excavation.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed various boehmites in their mineral collection.
meanings.sent3: The boehmites seemed to sparkle under the bright sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shone like boehmites in the darkness of the cave.
meanings.sent5: The boehmites glistened like tiny diamonds in the rock.

meanings.definition: The plural form of boehmite, a mineral.
meanings.sent1: The researchers studied the boehmites under a microscope.
meanings.sent2: Many boehmites were discovered in the remote mountain range.
meanings.sent3: The children collected boehmites as part of their rock collection.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in a blanket of boehmites, creating a stunning sight.
meanings.sent5: The boehmites in the soil glimmered like hidden treasures waiting to be found.
